text: [Music]
when I left HS I felt like I could
literally Take On The World after a
chance trip to South Africa in 2005 I
learned South Africa had this $3 billion
wine industry but less than 2% was owned
by black South Africans even though they
represented 85% of the population and it
was as if a light went off in my head
like oh my gosh if I don't tell this
story then someone else will this is
House of Mandela this is one that would
retell for 25 NOP 13 or $4.99 and I love
the packaging on this one the designs
represent Mandela shirts that he would
wear HBS gave me the confidence to make
what is now the largest importation and
marketing company bringing in Black
produced wines from Africa and the
African diaspora
[Music]
